footer.slogan: Secure Crypto Messaging. End-to-End Encrypted. Built on Blockchain.

welcome: Welcome to the official website of SolaChat
description: a decentralized cryptocurrency built on the Solana blockchain. The SolaChat project is designed to deliver fast, scalable, and secure transactions, shaping the future of decentralized finance (DeFi).
missionDescription: Our mission is to create a powerful, next-generation cryptocurrency that combines the speed and low-cost benefits of Solana with enhanced security and scalability. We aim to make digital payments and DeFi solutions accessible to everyone, with a focus on performance, efficiency, and transparency.
projectsDescription: Our organization hosts several key repositories related to the development and expansion of the SolaChat ecosystem:
project1Description: The core of our cryptocurrency, developed using Rust and Solana's Program Library (SPL).
project2Description: A secure and easy-to-use digital wallet for managing your SolaCoin tokens.
project3Description: A user-friendly explorer to track all SolaCoin-related transactions, blocks, and wallet activities on the Solana blockchain.
contributingDescription: SolaChat is an open-source project, and we welcome contributions from developers, designers, and blockchain enthusiasts. Here's how you can contribute:
step1: Explore the project and choose a part you would like to improve or expand.
step2: Discuss your ideas by opening an issue or joining our community channels.
step3: Work on your contribution by improving the code, design, or documentation.
step4: Submit your changes for review through a pull request.
step5: Once reviewed and approved, your contribution will be merged into the project.
contactDescription: If you have any questions or would like to collaborate, feel free to reach out to us through any of the following channels:
licenseDescription: All projects under the SolaCoin organization are licensed under the MIT License. Please refer to individual repositories for more details.
finalNote: Together, let's build the future of decentralized finance with SolaChat.

cta.title: Welcome to SolaChat
cta.description: More than 100,000 users are already enjoying secure and anonymous communication

security.title: Absolute Security
security.description: Instant message encryption and military-grade data protection.

anonymity.title: Network Anonymity
anonymity.description: Communicate without linking to a phone number or email. Full privacy.

transactions.title: Lightning-fast Transactions
transactions.description: Solana allows instant transfers and microtransactions.

decentralization.title: Global Decentralization
decentralization.description: No centralized servers. No one can block access.

web3.title: Web3 Integration
web3.description: Connect crypto wallets, manage NFTs and tokens directly in chat.

wallets.title: Secure Wallets
wallets.description: Built-in crypto wallet for easy asset storage.

transparency.title: Transparent Ecosystem
transparency.description: Open-source, no hidden fees, and maximum honesty.

hero.title: SolaChat
hero.subtitle: The next-generation messenger for the Web3 era

applications.title: SolaChat Applications

about_me_placeholder: Tell about yourself in Web3 context. Example: Solidity dev, DeFi enthusiast, NFT artist
username_description_part1: You can choose a public username in
username_description_part2: . Others can find you by this name without knowing your public key.
about_me_description: Any details, such as age, occupation or city.
example_about_me: Example: Solidity dev, DeFi enthusiast, NFT artist
username_min_length: Username must be at least 5 characters long
username_max_length: Username must be no more than 30 characters long
geolocation_info: Geolocation data is based on IP address and may be inaccurate.
chacha20_description: Messages in SolaChat are encrypted using ChaCha20 + Poly1305, ensuring confidentiality and integrity. Every message is encrypted before being sent.
key_safety_warning: ⚠️ Never share your private key with anyone. It grants access to your messages and identity.
key_usage_info: Your private key is used to decrypt messages from others. It is generated locally during registration and never sent to the server.
confirm_reset_description: You are about to delete your encryption keys. You won't be able to decrypt past messages.
